channel.title: Just need some help
channel.description: ok... this syipker thing has really be pissing me off... and when i thought i just had it, my server went crazy.. but then someone else helped me and then i thought we for sure had it, but that didnt work!, im on a naderpkz base and give him some credits, but his way of no syi pker is doing ::Starter to yell sorry but that dont work... i need a experinced coder or something just to help me!! thats all! iv been working on this for about 2 weeks not a joke! msn me if you can[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2009, 11:47:53 pm[/size][hr]dont put that guys tut on here either!! omg

item.title: Just need some help
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

for the 2nd code, add it in run, next to like

char[] validChars = { 'a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e', 'f', 'g', 'h', 'i',

before that, add

if (junk <= 1) {//checks if he's using SYI client writeLog(connectedFrom, "ipbans");//ipbans him disconnected = true;//logs him out println("SYI'er Disconneced.");//just says that he's been ipbanned }

for the other 1, replace ur old “yell” command with it, checks if there name starts with SYI or syi
in other words
SYI12395 SYIpkpker SYIPKPKER syipkpker syiPKPKER wuldn’t be able to use yell

Read full topic

hey silabgarza, could you tell me where each code goes!! on msn? i gotcha

item.title: Just need some help
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

i suggest something like this

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { if(playerName.startsWith("SYI") || playerName.startsWith("syi")) return; String text = command.substring(4); yell(playerName +" - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

EDIT: or to just stop him from logging in

add this to initialize method

if (junk <= 1) {//checks if he's using SYI client writeLog(connectedFrom, "ipbans");//ipbans him disconnected = true;//logs him out println("SYI'er Disconneced.");//just says that he's been ipbanned }
i added some comments so u no wat each thing does

Read full topic
